text: thumb Iglesia de San Gil Abad is a church in Burgos, Spain. It dates to the 14th-15th century. It was declared a Bien de Interés Cultural site by decree of 3 June 1931. ==References== Category:Roman Catholic churches in Burgos Category:Buildings and structures completed in the 14th century Category:Bien de Interés Cultural landmarks in the Province of Burgos
title: San Gil Abad
